turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Sarah, can you get me a coffee?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure boss, what would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'm thinking something...chocolate.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok. Can you be more specific?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: How about Starbucks?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, great, I will get myself something too, if you don't mind...

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Not at all, get whatever...consider it your bonus this month.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Very funny. Other than chocolate Starbucks, what would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'm glad you asked. How about a Cherry Mocha?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: That's not really chocolate. That's mocha.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Ok, how about a Cordusio?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Again, not very chocolate. Are you sure you know what you want?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Ok, how about a Caffe Americano?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I'll tell you what. I will get you a black and white. That has chocolate.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Isn't that also a mocha?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: It is but it also has chocolate.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Fine. That will be fine. Just charge it to the account and get yourself something.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Thanks! What size?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: What do you mean?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: How big?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: How big is what?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: The coffee.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I don't know.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I will surprise you.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thanks Sarah! You're the best!
